text: The cricket teams of Bangladesh and Australia have played against each other in ODIs since 1990. They have met on 19 occasions. Australia is most successful with 18 victories, Bangladesh have won in only 1 game. ==Summary of results== Total Won by Bangladesh Won by Australia Tie/NR In Bangladesh 6 0 6 0 In Australia 6 0 6 0 In Neutral Venue 7 1 6 0 Total 19 1 18 0 == List of matches == === In Bangladesh === === In Australia === === In Neutral Venue === == Related pages == *Bangladesh national cricket team *Australia national cricket team == References == == Other websites == *ESPNcricinfo Category:Lists of international cricket matches Category:Bangladeshi cricket lists Category:Cricket in Australia
title:
List of One Day International cricket matches played by Bangladesh and
Australia
